Name: Soldier
Description: You spent time in the military and have some combat experience.

Name: Wrestler
Description: You are fit from competing in wrestling matches and can read your opponent well.

Name: Bouncer
Description: Keeping the peace at night in the taverns keeps you healthy and you fight well.

Name: Thug
Description: Attack is the best defense. That is the law in the slums and you live by them.

Name: Thief
Description: Avoid trouble and keep yourself hidden. You are very fast and agile.

Name: Athlete
Description: You participated in the Greek olympics. You are at peak physical health.

Name: Scholar
Description: You are old and frail after a lifetime of study. But the crowds will love you!
